question: You are going to study in a college in the UK next year. You would like to stay in a college Hall of Residence.Write a letter to the college giving your accommodation requirements. You should outline what your room and food needs are and also ask what alternatives are available if they cannot provide what you want.
text: I am writing to enquire about the availability of accommodation in the college Hall of Residence for the 2022 - 2023 year.

I am an engineering graduate and will be attending a Master's course at Saint John college in the next academic year. My enrollment number is C001. I am looking for a single bed in two student Condo apartments in the Hall of Residence with a study table, chair and a closet.

Also, I am looking for a dining service in the same accommodation area. I prefer both vegetarian and non-vegetarian continental food with breakfast included. I would also like if there is a facility to cook your food within the premise of the residence area.

Please suggest an alternative accommodation outside the residence hall if you do not see any vacancy. I can also prefer to stay with a family near the college, within walkable distance who can accommodate a residence student.
I am looking for a positive response.
